name: 王多柏
objective: 本課程內容包含：半導體物理介紹，二極體電路，電晶體直流電路，電晶體交流電路，金氧半電晶體直流電路，金氧半電晶體交流電路，多級晶體電路，及運算放大器介紹。
schedule:
Introduction to Electronics
Operation Amplifiers
Diodes
MOS Field-Effect Transistors (MOSFETs)
Bipolar Junction Transistors (BJTs)
scorePolicy:
Homeworks and Quizs: 30%
Midterm: 30%
Final Exam: 30%
Class Participation: 10%
materials:
自編講義
參考書籍：
Microelectronic Circuits, Fifth edition. Sedra/Smith
Microelectronic Circuits, Sixth edition. Sedra/Smith
(代理書商：臺北圖書公司)
